properties.name: Matmos
properties.description:
Atmospheric sounds simulator. You must enable the MSI.Conversion resourcepack for this to work. 

Originally by Hurricaaane, then Dags, and now currently Sollace. https://github.com/Sollace/MAtmos

properties.name: Presence Footsteps
properties.description:
An overly complicated footstep sound enhancement mod for Minecraft, that adds footsteps and various other sounds into the game. You must add the PresenceFootstepsOfficial and PF.Resources resourcepacks for this to work! 

Originally by Huricaaaane, now maintained by Sollace. https://github.com/Sollace/Presence-Footsteps

properties.name: Conquest Soundpack
properties.description:
Hymns of Conquest replaces some of minecrafts sounds with new medieval sounds.

Made by Monsterfish_ http://www.planetminecraft.com/texture_pack/hyms-of-conquest/

properties.name: Voxel Map
properties.description: Minimap that also has a scrollable, zoomable world map (access with hotkey 'm'). Click and drag with the mouse, mousewheel to zoom. Right click to manage waypoints and stuff.

properties.name: Tabby Chat
properties.description: Mod that adds a different chat window with more features than the default chat window. TabbyChat 2 is the successor to TabbyChat, which was originally created by RocketMan10404, and now maintained by killjoy1221.  https://github.com/killjoy1221/TabbyChat-2

properties.name: Chunk Animator
properties.description: When new chunks are loaded in vanilla minecraft they simply "appear instantly", with this mod they can be animated to either appear from below or above. This mod shouldn't impact fps considerably because all it does is render chunks "somewhere else". Created by Lumien.

properties.name: Better Foliage
properties.description:
Mod that alters the appearance of leaves & grass. 

Made by Octarine-noise, link to mod can be found at: http://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/better-foliage
